#include<stdio.h>
int main()
{
   int t;
   scanf("%d",&t);
   while(t--)
   {
    int d[4],i,a1,a2,a3,a4;
    for(i=0;i<=3;i++)
      scanf("%d",&d[i]);
      a1=-d[1]+d[2]-d[3];
      a2=d[3]+d[0]-d[2];
      a3=-d[0]-d[3]+d[1];
      a4=d[0]-d[1]+d[2];
            printf("%d %d %d %d\n",a1,a2,a3,a4);
   }return 0;
}
